title: Attached to You
overview: The strange magnetic field makes the female president Yu Heng and the model of "male virtue" Gu Mingyu accidentally stick together, and the bitter enemies can only choose to live together. The only way for the two to separate is to love each other, and a bigger conspiracy makes their relationship more rough and difficult. Faced with each other's bodies "repelling" each other, he? she? How to choose?
